org.apache.archiva.redback.rbac

Interface Permission

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaPermission, MemoryPermission

    public interface Permission
    Permission A permission is the wrapper for an operation and a resource effectively saying that the operation is authorized for that resource. P(Operation, Resource)
    Author:
    Jesse McConnell, Joakim Erdfelt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      Long description of the Permission
      String getName()
      Get the short name of the permission.
      Operation getOperation()
      Operation that this permission is authorizing
      Resource getResource()
      This is the resource associated with this permission.
      boolean isPermanent()
      Test to see if the object is a permanent object or not.

      Set null

      Set the short name for this permission.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the short name of the permission. NOTE: This field is considered the Primary Key for this object.
        Returns:
        the short name for this permission.

      • getOperation

        Operation getOperation()
        Operation that this permission is authorizing

      • getResource

        Resource getResource()
        This is the resource associated with this permission. Implementors must always supply a Resource.
        Returns:
        the Resource.

      • isPermanent

        boolean isPermanent()
        Test to see if the object is a permanent object or not.
        Returns:
        true if the object is permanent.

      • setPermanent

        void setPermanent(boolean permanent)
        Set flag indicating if the object is a permanent object or not.
        Parameters:
        permanent - true if the object is permanent.
